creator: nouriyat@gsicommerce.com
text:
While installing httpd-2.2.17 

after I make install, it errors out and gives me 

checking whether to enable mod_ssl... checking dependencies
checking for SSL/TLS toolkit base... none
checking for OpenSSL version... checking openssl/opensslv.h usability... no
checking openssl/opensslv.h presence... no
checking for openssl/opensslv.h... no
checking openssl/ssl.h usability... no
checking openssl/ssl.h presence... no
checking for openssl/ssl.h... no
no OpenSSL headers found
checking for SSL-C version... checking sslc.h usability... no
checking sslc.h presence... no
checking for sslc.h... no
no SSL-C headers found
configure: error: ...No recognized SSL/TLS toolkit detected
....

...Please advised me on how I can resolved this matter.  keep in mind I have already installed openssl already....

Thank you
Please use the mailing list for advice on compiling -- you've not demonstrated that "no OpenSSL headers found" is incorrectly issued here.
creator: covener@gmail.com
